Text:
I keep getting this error when uploading files.

Fatal error: UploadAutoloader::autoload() ['function.require']: Failed opening required '/shareit/app/vendor/Upload/../finfo.php' (include_path='.:/usr/local/lib/php:/usr/local/php5/lib/pear') in /shareit/app/vendor/Upload/Autoloader.php on line 75

What's the problem?
